title: Ex-Goldman Banker, a Key 1MDB Trial Witness, Is Challenged by Defense; Lawyers for former banker Roger Ng seek to undermine testimony of a one-time colleague, Timothy Leissner
text:
Marc Agnifilo, a lawyer for Mr. Ng, suggested that Mr. Leissner's court testimony didn't match what he previously told the Federal Bureau of Investigation.

Prosecutors allege that Mr. Ng, a former Goldman managing director, conspired with the Malaysian financier Jho Low to bribe officials in Malaysia and the United Arab Emirates, and to launder billions of dollars stolen from 1Malaysia Development Bhd., a state-controlled economic development company known as 1MDB.

Write to James Fanelli at james.fanelli@wsj.com

Ex-Goldman Banker, a Key 1MDB Trial Witness, Is Challenged by Defense
